sentence: En Georgia, por ejemplo, los partidarios de la Gran Mentira, la falsa afirmacin de que las elecciones de 2020 fueron robadas al expresidente Donald Trump, abuchearon al gobernador Brian Kemp, un republicano acrrimo que se enfrenta a un desafo en las primarias de un candidato elegido a dedo por el expresidente.
author: Por Frida Ghitis
title: OPININ | As podra verse la venganza de Putin contra Estados Unidos

sentence: Lets hear from Beau on Georgia The debate between Brian Kemp and David Perdue was quite a spectacle.
title: "Try to Think What We Are Going to Do Ourselves"

sentence: Kemp Signs Bills Banning Books, Classroom Discussion of Race, and Trans Athletes Georgia Republican Governor Brian Kemp has signed a raft of bills overhauling public education in the state, including one banning books deemed to be offensive? from school libraries.
title: WHO Warns of Rising Measles Cases After Pandemic Disrupted Vaccinations of Children
